channel.title: [FIXED] Auto-Save error
channel.description: I've encountered this in the boxes platforming area of the early game. I fell off while sprint jumping and the game autosaved me into an endless loop of falling. setpos -3830.382080 -8403.986328 -3695.877197;setang 31.893311 -89.533081 -0.524763 Save included. Same issue: [url='https://forums.blackmesasource.com/index.php/Thread/27968-Infinite-spawn-loop/?postID=607539#post607539']Infinite spawn loop[/url] (Found after I posted.) save.zip (197 KB)
